credit_line: Museum purchase from Friends of Textiles Fund
title: Kimono
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave resist printed with a stencil
description: All over middle grey tone created by a tiny dot pattern created by a resist supplied through a stencil. Fabric dyed dark blue. A crest appears on each shoulder on the front and center of shoulders at back. Kimono is unlined and the fabric is double faced.
name: Kimono
